title: Update: Officially second player in oce to get mastery 7
body:
https://www.masterypoints.com/highscores/champion/kayn/0/oce was beaten by grenoga so shout out to him.

Also should be second place oce after the update as my last game was 1103 mastery points.

Also im now a couple games off being in the top 40 worldwide, hypeeeee.

As another tidbit as far as im aware i am the only player in existence who has gotten mastery 7 playing him mid, until more come out of the woodwork im going to just assume that seeing as there are so few mastery 7's atm and his usual off meta lane is top not mid.

replies.body:
lol u fuck 7 mastery pointss m7 on kayn new acct why why
did u do this with xayah and rakan

conrgrats! impressive. I only have 1 level 7 ({{champion:101}} )

Trying to get cait/lucian there as well over time....
oh snap. Its not what it looks like =P I don't even play Xerath anymore
Don't lie to me, you're a traitor too!

I collect em like pokemans, I find the fastest way to grind out S ranks is to maintain 6 cs per minute as a minimum, ward on cooldown and in good spots, do alot of damage, take alot of damage, use alot of cc.

Basically try to get high values on as much of the stat screen as you can.

Well done :D

Just curious: why didn't you keep playing on your main? Why make a new account just for Kayn?

Either way, good job x)

To put it simply i just felt like a fresh start for a fresh champion.

That and i wanted to see if the reason i have almost 10 mastery 7's already (so basically every champ i have ever played more than 20 games on) was because of my elo or my mechanics.

I guess i answered that question with this account haha.

I do plan to eventually take everything i learn from this account and apply it to yellowbrickroad so i can push it out of bronze 5, but until then im having more fun on this account where the players dont tilt me quite as much.

Hell at this point only reason i want to put myself through the pain of grinding out yellow is all the event exclusive icons and borders i have, the mast 7's would be easy to get back (hell i got my kat mast 7 in under 20 games)

Congrats man!

Its wonderful when you find that champ you just click 100% with! haha
gj. I have no level 7 champ :(
